parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh** (default): Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: RegionNo
parameters.description:
The region ID of the VPC.

>  For more information about Cloud Firewall supported regions, see [Supported regions](~~195657~~).

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.
